metadata.Title: CVE-2023-35788 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - high
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in fl_set_geneve_opt in net/sched/cls_flower.c inthe Linux kernel before 6.3.7. It allows an out-of-bounds write in theflower classifier code via TCA_FLOWER_KEY_ENC_OPTS_GENEVE packets. This mayresult in denial of service or privilege escalation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-35788` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-24-generic - 6.2.0-24.24
linux-image-6.2.0-24-generic-lpae - 6.2.0-24.24
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-24-generic - 6.2.0-24.24
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-24-generic-64k - 6.2.0-24.24
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1007-kvm - 6.2.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1006-aws - 6.2.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1006-azure - 6.2.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1008-gcp - 6.2.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1004-ibm - 6.2.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1007-lowlatency - 6.2.0-1007.7
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1007-lowlatency-64k - 6.2.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1006-oracle - 6.2.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-6.2.0-1007-raspi - 6.2.0-1007.9
linux-image-6.2.0-1007-raspi-nolpae - 6.2.0-1007.9
No subscription required

linux-image-6.2.0-1002-starfive - 6.2.0-1002.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-24.24').
linux-kvm package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1007.7').
linux-aws package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1006.6').
linux-azure package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1006.6').
linux-gcp package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1008.8').
linux-ibm package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1004.4').
linux-lowlatency package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1007.7').
linux-oracle package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1006.6').
linux-raspi package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1007.9').
linux-allwinner: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was pending').
linux-starfive package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.2.0-1002.2').
